data.oai_dc:dc: Occurrence|large carnivores, wolverine, lynx, wolf, brown bear, Skandobs

Observations from the Norwegian tracking system for lynx, wolverine, brown bear and wolf. In this database everyone can register observations of tracks, signs or sightings of large carnivores in Scandinavia.|Rovdata is responsible for operating, communicating and developing the Norwegian Large Predator Monitoring Program. We collect, analyse, and report monitoring data on the Eurasian lynx, wolverine, brown bear, wolf and golden eagle.|12,116 occurrences
